FeeRedeemed(address,uint256).notice: emitted on ERC20 funds redeemed by validator

getFeeManagerBank().notice: returns the bank used to manage fees

getNumClaimsRedeemed(address).notice: this function can be called to check the number of claims that has been redeemed for the validator

resetFeePerClaim(uint256).notice: contract owner can reset the value of fee per claim
